Symbol.Script_VL:
!CALL "Сортамент_арматуры" parameters all !values "class" reinforce_class dim reinforce_gost[] : reinforce_gost[1] = "" dim reinforce_class[] : reinforce_class[1] = "" dim reinforce_diam[][] : reinforce_diam[1][1] = 0 dim reinforce_weight[][] : reinforce_diam[1][1] = 0 FILE_DEPENDENCE "Сортамент_арматуры.txt" ch6=OPEN("TEXT","Сортамент_арматуры.txt","SEPARATOR=';',MODE=RO,LIBRARY") i = 1 : gost_in="" : class_in="" : diam_in=0 : area_in=0 : weight_in=0 : nclass=1 : ndiam=1 REPEAT n=INPUT(ch6, i+1, 1, gost_in, class_in, diam_in, area_in, weight_in) if reinforce_class[nclass] = "" then reinforce_class[nclass]= class_in reinforce_gost[nclass]= gost_in endif if class_in <> reinforce_class[nclass] then nclass = nclass + 1 reinforce_class[nclass]= class_in reinforce_gost[nclass]= gost_in ndiam = 1 endif if reinforce_diam[ndiam][nclass] = 0 then reinforce_diam[ndiam][nclass] = diam_in / 1000 reinforce_weight[ndiam][nclass] = weight_in endif if diam_in/1000 <> reinforce_diam[ndiam][nclass] then ndiam = ndiam + 1 reinforce_diam[ndiam][nclass] = diam_in / 1000 reinforce_weight[ndiam][nclass] = weight_in endif i = i + 1 UNTIL n = -1 close (ch6) end reinforce_gost, reinforce_class, reinforce_diam, reinforce_weight
!"Class2Gost": ! nstolb = 0 ! for i = 1 to vardim1(reinforce_class) ! if class = reinforce_class[i] then nstolb = i ! next i ! gost = reinforce_gost[nstolb] !return ! !"GetDiametr": ! i = 1 : usl = 0 ! if nstolb = 0 then nstolb = 1 ! REPEAT ! diam_temp[i] = reinforce_diam[i][nstolb] ! i = i + 1 ! if i <= vardim1(reinforce_diam) then ! usl = (reinforce_diam[i][nstolb] = 0) ! else ! usl = 1 ! endif ! UNTIL usl !return ! ! !"Diametr2Weight": ! nstrok = 1 ! if nstolb = 0 then nstolb = 1 ! for i = 1 to vardim1(reinforce_diam) ! if diametr = reinforce_diam[i][nstolb] then nstrok = i ! next i ! weight = reinforce_weight[nstrok][nstolb] !return
